section.name: Welcome to jade4spring!
section.p: jade4spring is an open source project, released under the LGPL license, which provides easy integration of the JADE framework in Spring application contexts.

subsection.name: Background
subsection.p: jade4spring was started as an in-house project for easily creating JADE agents and containers through Spring application contexts.

The project was started by developers at
Integrasco A/S
and in February 2008 we decided that it was now time to release it to the open source community.
